title: Introduction to Stock Market
content: The stock market allows investors to buy and sell company shares and earn profit based on price movement.

title: Stock Market for Beginners
content: This article explains stock basics including shares trading profits risks and how markets work.

title: Stock Market News Today
content: Indian stock market gained today due to positive global market sentiment and strong economy factors.

title: How to Start Investing in Stocks
content: Learn step by step how to open demat account invest safely and understand stock movement.

title: Basics of Mutual Funds
content: Mutual funds collect money from investors and invest in diversified assets reducing individual risk.

title: Types of Mutual Funds Explained
content: There are different mutual funds including equity funds debt funds hybrid funds and index funds.

title: Should You Invest in Mutual Funds
content: Mutual funds are best for long term investments stable returns and safer than direct stocks for new investors.

title: Understanding Cryptocurrency
content: Cryptocurrency is digital currency based on blockchain technology and includes Bitcoin and Ethereum.

title: Crypto Market News
content: Cryptocurrency market saw major price movement today with Bitcoin rising and altcoins showing volatility.

title: Is Cryptocurrency Safe to Invest
content: Many beginners are investing in cryptocurrency but it involves high risk and requires proper knowledge.

title: Banking and Savings Accounts
content: Savings accounts are used for storing money securely while earning interest from banks.

title: Fixed Deposits vs Savings Account
content: Fixed deposits provide higher interest compared to savings accounts but money is locked for a period.

title: How Banking System Works
content: Banks play a key role in economy by handling deposits loans payments and secure money transactions.
